objectives_summary: Expand your knowledge on the various concepts of Network+
You will become to be familiar with TCP/IP Protocol Suite, addresing, and IPv7 all core concepts that a network technician needs to know

You will understand the infrastructure services that operate inside virtually every network, also known as DHCP and DNS. DHCP handles the automatic assignment of IP addresses and DNS provides name resolution.
